text: Total Drama is an American animated television series in the United States that have below the airdates listed in the table with currently six Total Drama seasons in the series. The show first premiered on Cartoon Network on June 12, 2008 and ended on October 9, 2015. Fresh TV announced they made a show with some adults while its owners Warner Bros. and Discovery Inc. ==Characters== *Ezekiel - A boy with long brown hair, black eyes, a chin, a blue hat, and a traditional/stereotypical Canadian outfit. ==Episodes== *List of Total Drama episodes Category:2000s American animated television series Category:2010s American animated television series Category:2008 American television series debuts Category:2015 American television series endings Category:English-language television programs
